title: Add teaser link screen before showing the Valentine question

requirements.text: Change the recipient flow so the page initially shows a single prominent link-style call-to-action reading exactly "Click here for a surprise" instead of immediately showing the "Will you be my Valentine, Keya?" question.

quotes: Can you replace that text where it says click here for a surprise

acceptanceCriteria: On first page load, the Valentine question and Yes/No buttons are not visible.
The initial screen prominently displays the exact text: "Click here for a surprise".
The initial call-to-action is keyboard accessible (can be activated via Enter/Space) and clearly indicates it is clickable.

requirements.text: When the recipient clicks/taps "Click here for a surprise", transition the UI to display the existing Valentine proposal question "Will you be my Valentine, Keya?" along with the existing Yes/No interactions and animations.

quotes: whenever she clicks the link it asked the question will you be my valentine?

acceptanceCriteria: After clicking/tapping the teaser link, the Valentine proposal card appears with the existing question text and Yes/No buttons.
The existing playful "No" behavior continues to work as it does now (random messages, movement after threshold).
The existing "Yes" acceptance state and heart animation still work.

requirements.text: Ensure the Share section remains available in the proposal experience (after the teaser is clicked) and continues to copy the current URL and a prefilled English message.
acceptanceCriteria: After revealing the proposal, the Share section is visible and functional.
Copy Link continues to copy the current page URL.
Copy Message continues to copy an English message including the existing wording about clicking the link for a surprise.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only shadcn components).
Do not modify files listed in frontend.immutablePaths (Internet Identity and actor hooks, main entry).
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Do not add new authentication providers beyond Internet Identity.
Do not add a separate backend feature or storage for tracking whether the teaser was clicked.
Do not redesign the overall Valentine proposal interactions beyond adding the teaser-to-proposal transition.
